attributes.action: Use £39bn to help prevent UK tax payers from dying waiting for NHS help.
attributes.background: Use the £39bn EU payment to improve our NHS. Prevent long standing UK tax payers from waiting to live or die on waiting lists with life threatening illness and introduce a law where limited tax contribution would result in mandatory health insurance contribution in order to receive care.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "mandatory health insurance contribution".

You could start a new petition calling for an insurance-based healthcare system if that's something you would like to see happen.
